title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the perfect companion for any shooting enthusiast. Designed with your hearing protection in mind, these earmuffs offer a low noise/frequency tune for crystal-clear sound clarity and enhanced safety on the shooting range.

Experience the ultimate sound quality with dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers that deliver impeccable audio. The sound-activated compression reaction of just 0.02 seconds ensures that your ears are protected from sudden loud noises, while the independent volume controls allow you to fine-tune your listening experience.

With a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs provide exceptional sound dampening, allowing you to focus on your shooting without distractions. Equipped with two omnidirectional microphones, you'll never miss a beat of the action. Plus, the built-in audio input jack and recessed volume control knobs give you even more control over your sound environment.

Comfort is key, and these earmuffs deliver. The comfortable headband features a durable metal wire frame that folds for easy storage, making them perfect for on-the-go shooters. Operating on just two AAA batteries (included), these earmuffs are ready to use straight out of the box.

Measuring at 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing only 0.98 pounds, these earmuffs are incredibly lightweight and won't weigh you down during your shooting sessions. Say goodbye to heavy, uncomfortable ear protection and hello to a seamless shooting experience.

Protect your hearing without compromising on sound quality. Choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, and elevate your shooting experience to new heights.

Introducing the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the ultimate solution for protecting your hearing at the shooting range. With low noise/frequency tuning, these earmuffs offer natural sound clarity and added safety. 

Equipped with dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers, you can experience crystal-clear sound. The sound-activated compression reaction of just 0.02 seconds ensures that your hearing is instantly protected, while the independent volume controls allow you to customize your listening experience. 

Featuring a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs utilize two omnidirectional microphones to provide optimal sound detection. The audio input jack and recessed volume control knobs offer convenient functionality, and the composite housing effectively dampens sound for maximum performance. 

Designed for comfort, the earmuffs boast a comfortable headband with a metal wire frame that folds for easy storage. They operate on two AAA batteries, which are included in the package for your convenience. 

Measuring at 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing just 0.98 pounds, these earmuffs are lightweight and comfortable to wear. You won't even feel the heaviness of the ear protection while shooting. 

Experience unparalleled hearing protection with the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Order yours today and enjoy a safe and enjoyable shooting experience.

Featuring a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs offer exceptional sound dampening to ensure a safe shooting experience. With recessed volume control knobs, you have complete control over the volume levels, allowing you to tailor the sound to your preferences. The composite housing of the earmuffs effectively minimizes external noise, ensuring a focused and enjoyable shooting session.

But that's not all - these earmuffs are also incredibly comfortable to wear. The headband is designed with a metal wire frame that can be easily folded for convenient storage. Weighing just 0.98 pounds and measuring 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches, you'll hardly feel the presence of these earmuffs while shooting.

To make your experience even more convenient, we've included 2 AAA batteries in the package, so you can start using them right away. Don't compromise on your hearing protection - choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs and enjoy a comfortable and safe shooting experience like never before!

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product that will attractive to buyers. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below.

---

Title: Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds

Description: Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs


Protect your hearing at the shooting range with Walker's Razor Slim Protection Ear Muff with low noise/frequency tuned for natural sound clarity and added safety

Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers for clear sound with sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls

Noise reduction rating of 23 dB with 2 omnidirectional microphones and includes an audio input jack and recessed volume control knobs plus composite housing for effective sound dampening

Comfortable headband with a metal wire frame that folds for easy storage and operates on 2 AAA batteries that are already included in the package so it is ready out-of-the-box

Easy to use and comfortable to wear that measures 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighs 0.98 pounds so you cannot feel the heaviness of the ear protection when shooting
